rusty_dagger.name: Rusty Dagger
rusty_dagger.description: A well-worn dagger, its blade tarnished with rust. It's better than nothing.

wooden_shield.name: Wooden Shield
wooden_shield.description: A simple shield made of reinforced wood. Offers basic protection.

leather_helmet.name: Leather Helmet
leather_helmet.description: A basic leather helmet, providing minor defense for the head.

healing_potion_1.name: Small Healing Potion
healing_potion_1.description: A small vial filled with a glowing red liquid. Restores a small amount of health.

strength_potion_1.name: Minor Strength Potion
strength_potion_1.description: A bubbling yellow potion that temporarily boosts your physical strength.

old_key.name: Old Key
old_key.description: A rusty, ornate key. It might unlock something important.

golden_idol.name: Golden Idol
golden_idol.description: A small, heavy idol carved from pure gold. It's incredibly valuable.

mana_crystal.name: Mana Crystal
mana_crystal.description: A shimmering blue crystal that radiates magical energy. Replenishes mana.

orcish_axe.name: Orcish Battle Axe
orcish_axe.description: A heavy, brutish axe favored by orcish warriors. Its edge is crude but sharp.

enchanted_ring_of_protection.name: Enchanted Ring of Protection
enchanted_ring_of_protection.description: A silver ring glowing with a faint blue aura, offering magical protection.
